Package org.decomposer.nlp.extraction

Interface Summary
Conceptualizer  
FeatureExtractor Translation interface, for turning document text into a MapVector
Idf  
 

Class Summary
BoundedFeatureDictionary  
ConceptualizerImpl  
DelimitedDictionaryFeatureExtractor The most basic implementation of the FeatureExractor interface, which tokenizes input text by splitting on a given raw String, then uses a supplied FeatureDictionary to look up the feature's index, and then weights the resultant MapVector by tf-idf weighting (where the idf is calculated based on a supplied Idf implementation.
FeatureDictionary Dead simple bi-directional map (String to Integer) for translating tokens in text into columns ids in a term-document matrix.
FeatureDictionary.Feature
